name: Sausage, pepper and onion hoagies (Rachael Ray)
ingredients: 3/4 lb. each sweet Italian sausage and hot Italian sausage
2-3 jarred hot cherry peppers, banana peppers, or pepperoncii, finely chopped
3 Tbsp hot pepper juice, from jar
1/2 tsp each oregano, thyme, and parsley
instructions: Cover, reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes.
In another skillet over medium heat add 2 Tbsp oil.
Add garlic, onion, cubanelle and red peppers.
Drain sausages and return pan to stove, raising heat to medium high.
Add a drizzle of oil, brown and crisp casings.
Remove and slice into 2 “ pieces on an angle and put back in pan to sear.
Split and toast bread under broiler.
Melt oil, butter over medium, add garlic and let sizzle 1-2 minutes.
Brush rolls with garlic butter and sprinkle with spices.
Combine peppers and onions to sausages, add hot peppers and juice.
